Reviews.Title: “Good.”

Reviews.Content: hotel convenient location close cafes shops cuisine near station station metro station front bus stop clean size reception desk ready help food delicious fresh choice repeats day whom eat im bothered bar girls notice hotel suitable people tour programs traveling business 3

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Artim Charlottenberg- Richard Nov 2011”
Reviews.Author: Pakses
Reviews.Content: hotel located 100yds bahn station modern bedroom ample storage space heating comfortable bed decent size shower cubicle breakfast buffet style choice cereals bread meat cheese jams cooked selection scrambled egg streaky bacon sausage front stayed 207 noisy summer sleep window air conditioning staff helpful particularly welcoming probably german plenty restaurants located 100yds road

Reviews.Title: “Good for a less-expensive hotel”
Reviews.Author: philliesfan80
Reviews.Content: atrium charlottenburg cheaper hotel west berlin location near sbahn station perfect convient icc day breakfast included options food bathrooms tiny clean thats daytime front desk person friendly night weekend people nicer free computer lobby overall price nice stay

Reviews.Title: “good location clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: daveCarlow
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 nights location beside charlottenburg sbahn station hotel clean cudnt fault lots yougurt english speaking found ones spoke friendly welcoming answered questions berlin overall recommend hotel berlin probably stay closer city centre ease central

Reviews.Title: “Good location for ICC, reasonable rooms, Great Breakfast, no Air-Con, noisy road, AWFUL pillows”
Reviews.Author: as530
Reviews.Content: title fair charlottenburg sbahn station location ok close fairly seedy shops windows etc breakfast werent expecting included main noise road summer aircon 30 degree heat sleep windows consequently woken morning youre tight budget summer offers value
